title: People who still believei n Mordekaiser bot and then feed their asses off.

replies.body:
People who Pick the wrong support for Mordekaiser bot. After asking  what support they should play with Morde.

https://giphy.com/gifs/form-z9AUvhAEiXOqA
People who try to talk shit about your champion after they've only played six ranked matches ever. https://imgur.com/a/2ysvDMQ

> [{quoted}](name=FyreWall,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RX2sJNIU,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-10-17T18:23:10.716+0000)
>
> People who try to talk shit about your champion after they've only played six ranked matches ever. https://imgur.com/a/2ysvDMQ

Oh yes, but I only played 11 flex matches to finish my promos.

**People who still believe in Mordekaiser. **

Fixed it for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RX2sJNIU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-10-12T21:09:05.065+0000)
>
> **People who still believe in Mordekaiser. **
> 
> Fixed it for you.

I'm about to hit D5 playing only morde. Fite me

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RX2sJNIU,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-10-12T21:17:42.385+0000)
>
> I'm about to hit D5 playing only morde. Fite me

How can you fight something that's clearly an illusion?
The act of disbelieving  an illusion is how you fight it. However when it turns out it's not an illusion your gonna get Bonked in the Head Hard

> [{quoted}](name=FyreWall,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RX2sJNIU,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-10-17T18:47:54.694+0000)
>
> https://imgur.com/a/URCal2d
> 
> _why the fuck you lyyyiiiin_

Your image doesn't work.

> [{quoted}](name=Summonah12369,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RX2sJNIU,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2018-10-17T18:57:00.045+0000)
>
> Your image doesn't work.

yup, i fixed it. But dont lie my guy, makes you look like more of an idiot than you were to post this discussion.

> [{quoted}](name=FyreWall,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RX2sJNIU,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2018-10-17T19:15:08.514+0000)

Christ it's like talking to a brick wall
